member.name: T:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi
member.summary: Portal settings.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetSmtpSettings
member.summary: Returns the current portal SMTP settings.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.SaveSmtpSettings(ASC.Api.Settings.Smtp.SmtpSettingsWrapper)
member.summary: Saves the SMTP settings for the current portal.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.ResetSmtpSettings
member.summary: Resets SMTP settings of the current portal.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.TestSmtpSettings
member.summary: Tests the SMTP settings for the current portal (send test message to the user email).

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetSmtpOperationStatus
member.summary: Returns the SMTP test process status.
member.short: Get the SMTP test process status

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetSsoSettingsV2
member.summary: Returns the current portal SSO settings.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetDefaultSsoSettingsV2
member.summary: Returns the default portal SSO settings.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetSsoSettingsV2Constants
member.summary: Returns the constants of the SSO settings.
member.short: Get the constants of the SSO settings

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.SaveSsoSettingsV2(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the SSO settings for the current portal.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.ResetSsoSettingsV2
member.summary: Resets the SSO settings of the current portal.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetLdapSettings
member.summary: Returns the current portal LDAP settings.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetLdapCronSettings
member.summary: Returns the LDAP autosynchronous cron expression of the current portal if it exists.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.SetLdapCronSettings(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the LDAP autosynchronous cron expression of the current portal.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.SyncLdap
member.summary: Starts synchronizing users and groups by LDAP.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.TestLdapSync
member.summary: Starts the process of collecting preliminary changes on the portal during the synchronization process according to the selected LDAP settings.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.SaveLdapSettings(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the LDAP settings specified in the request and starts importing/synchronizing users and groups by LDAP.
member.param: LDAP settings in the serialized string format
Specifies if the errors of checking certificates are allowed (true) or not (false)

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.TestLdapSave(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starts the process of collecting preliminary changes on the portal during the saving process according to the LDAP settings.
member.param: LDAP settings in the serialized string format
Specifies if the errors of checking certificates are allowed (true) or not (false)

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetLdapOperationStatus
member.summary: Returns the LDAP synchronization process status.
member.short: Get the LDAP synchronization process status

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetDefaultLdapSettings
member.summary: Returns the LDAP default settings.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetSettings
member.summary: Returns a list of all the available portal settings with the current values for each parameter.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetQuotaUsed
member.summary: Returns the space usage quota for the portal with the space usage of each module.
member.returns: Space usage and limits for upload

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.RecalculateQuota
member.summary: Starts the process of recalculating quota.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.CheckRecalculateQuota
member.summary: Checks the process of recalculating quota.
member.returns: Boolean value: True - quota recalculating process is enabled, False - quota recalculating process is disabled

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetBuildVersions
member.summary: Returns the current build version.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetVersions
member.summary: Returns a list of the availibe portal versions including the current version.
member.returns: List of availibe portal versions including the current version

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.SetVersion(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the current portal version to the one with the ID specified in the request.
member.returns: List of availibe portal versions including the current version

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetWebItemSecurityInfo(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Returns the security settings for the product, module or add-ons specified in the request.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetWebItemSecurityInfo(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the availability of the module with the ID specified in the request.
member.returns: Boolean value: True - module is enabled, False - module is disabled

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetEnabledModules
member.summary: Returns a list of all the enabled modules.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetPasswordSettings
member.summary: Returns the portal password settings.

member.summary: Sets the security settings to the product, module or add-ons.
member.param: Specifies if the module is enabled or not

member.summary: Sets access to the products, modules or add-ons specified in the request.
member.param: Modules, products or add-ons with security information

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Settings.SettingsApi.GetProductAdministrators(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a list of all the administrators of the product with the ID specified in the request.

member.summary: Checks if the selected user is an administrator of a product with the ID specified in the request.

member.summary: Sets the selected user as an administrator of a product with the ID specified in the request.
member.param: Specifies if the user will be added to the product as an administrator or deleted from it
